CopyModeType.name: CopyModeType
CopyModeType.description: copy destination mode type: 1- monitor-only 2- network.

rlSmon.name: rlSmon
rlSmon.contactinfo: Postal: 170 West Tasman Drive San Jose , CA 95134-1706 USA Website: Cisco Small Business Home http://www.cisco.com/smb>;, Cisco Small Business Support Community <http://www.cisco.com/go/smallbizsupport>
rlSmon.description: This private MIB module defines SMON private MIBs.

rlPortCopyMibVersion.name: rlPortCopyMibVersion
rlPortCopyMibVersion.description: MIB's version, the current version is 1.

rlPortCopySupport.name: rlPortCopySupport
rlPortCopySupport.description: supported - The standard portCopy is supported. notSupported - the standard portCopy is not supported. only basic portCopy operation is supported.

rlPortCopyVlanTaggingTable.name: rlPortCopyVlanTaggingTable
rlPortCopyVlanTaggingTable.description: A supplementing table for portCopyTable. For every portCopyDest a vlan-tagging option is available.

rlPortCopyVlanTaggingEntry.name: rlPortCopyVlanTaggingEntry
rlPortCopyVlanTaggingEntry.description: Each entry specify how mirrored packets will transmit from the portCopyDest: Tagged or unTagged. The values in this entry will be valid only when the dot1dBasePort will be configured as a portCopyDest in the portCopyTable.

rlPortCopyVlanTagging.name: rlPortCopyVlanTagging
rlPortCopyVlanTagging.description: TRUE - Mirrored packets will transmit from portCopyDest - Tagged FALSE - Mirrored packets will transmit from portCopyDest - unTagged

rlPortCopyMode.name: rlPortCopyMode
rlPortCopyMode.description: This scalar defines a mode of the copy destination port

rlPortCopySessionsEnabled.name: rlPortCopySessionsEnabled
rlPortCopySessionsEnabled.description: This scalar enables globaly port monitoring sessions
